data.text: RT @Aeromexico: ¡Es hora de conocer nuestro hangar y el #737MAX! Cuéntanos qué es lo que te apasiona más de la aviación y por qué te gusta…
@ChrisKwiers Please share your booking code, and a brief description of your situation*CR
There are only a few Pueblos Magicos in Mexico that are on the coast, Sayulita is perhaps the best of all. Oh, and there's world-class surfing in warm tropical water, btw. 😎 https://t.co/el9ohOW1fh
@CosmicSpeck The email response time is 15 to 20 business days, an executive will contact you as soon as possible.
@CosmicSpeck Hi, Megan! Please share with us by DM your reservation code or the ticket number. *AA  https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F
Always wear sunscreen 🌞! (Environmentally friendly, of course 🌎) https://t.co/SnUmDqYSg8
@abrakasarah Please send us a DM explaining your situation with your booking code. *CR
We know that our hospitality sets us apart. And although masks are still mandatory on our flights, know that there is a smile behind each. https://t.co/jtSbSkR6L5
@anthonyrallo Hi! We're sorry we give you that impression, please share the information via WhatsApp (55 5133 4000) typing the word "ayuda" and one of our executives will help you. *YC

data.text:
It’s time you changed everything you thought you knew about Guadalajara. Rediscover the food, music, and nightlife of Jalisco.  
https://t.co/6At1ztQth5 https://t.co/hwotVaYC5H

In Xochimilco, good things come to you (float to you). Trajineras selling quesadillas, tacos de guisado, and more will take you way back to Mexico-Tenochtitlan. Only in Mexico City. https://t.co/Sv0Vq1CBS0
@SSaritar Hi, Sarita! Please share with us by DM your voucher numbers, so we can verify what happened. *AA  https://t.co/JgS7hgByUd

https://t.co/S9PuZwOQHv https://t.co/W1i2YLehMF
